thread.section_title: Grange Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice!
thread.title_full: Very nice! - Review of Grange Wellington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Richy1708
title: Very nice!
text:
My first time at this brand of hotel... booked by work.
The setting is very nice, in a peaceful square overlooking some nice gardens. The building itself was lovely.
The check-in process was pleasant - the open areas well appointed.
The lifts were prompt and the room was very nice. Good quality furnishings, not a bad size for London, had a great night sleep. The ensuite was good too - with quality complimentary toiletries. A powerful overhead shower, with a powerful sloosher.
Breakfast was nice - coffee was good, croissants were lovely, english buffet breakfast was okay. Service was good - prompt with the toast.
Check-out process was pleasant and swift.
Good place, in a good location.
